product_title: Floral Print Tie Neck Long Sleeve Dress
product_description: Featuring a print by artist Francesca DiMattio, who remixes porcelain patterns for a strikingly modern look, this silk dress is a vibrant way to start the day.
product_details_and_care:
Featuring a print by artist Francesca DiMattio, who remixes porcelain patterns for a strikingly modern look, this silk dress is a vibrant way to start the day. A tie neck and pleated skirt adds movement to the style.
Point collar with ties
Long sleeves
100% silk
Dry clean
